SharpNeat.​Experiments
namespace SharpNeat.Experiments
ModelUtils
public static
ModelUtils

Static utility methods for working with strongly typed model classes.

Functions
GetMandatoryProperty
public static TPropertyValue GetMandatoryProperty<TModel, TPropertyValue>(
TModel model,
Expression<Func<TModel, TPropertyValue?>> propertyExpression
)
where TModel : class
where TPropertyValue : struct

Attempt to get a mandatory property from a model object.

Type Parameters
TModel

Model type.

TPropertyValue

Type of the property to get.

Parameters
model
TModel

The model object that contains the property to get.

propertyExpression
Expression<Func<TModel, TPropertyValue?>>

Expression that refers to the required property on the model type.

Returns

The property value, if the property is not null.

Exceptions
ConfigurationException

Throw if the required property is null.
